get.summary: Get a list of cars for the authenticated user

post.summary: Store a new car for the authenticated user

items.example: The license plate field is required.

delete.summary: Delete a car owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: car_id
parameters.description: ID of the car to delete

get.summary: Get a paginated list of reviews for a specific driver

parameters.name: driver_id
parameters.description: ID of the driver whose reviews are being fetched

post.summary: Submit a review for a specific driver

parameters.name: driver_id
parameters.description: ID of the driver being reviewed

get.summary: Get a paginated list of trips for the authenticated passenger
Get details of a specific trip

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the trip to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the trip to cancel

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the trip to update

start_address.description: Starting address of the trip. Required if 'end_address' and 'preferences' are not provided.

end_address.description: Ending address of the trip. Required if 'start_address' and 'preferences' are not provided.

preferences.description: Passenger's ride preferences. Required if 'start_address' and 'end_address' are not provided.

sanctum.description: Enter the access token in the format: `Bearer <your-access-token>`
sanctum.name: Authorization
